channel.title: Prerequisites on Presidium
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequisites on Presidium

item.title: Prerequisites
item.description:
The following tools are required to use Presidium:

  1. Install Homebrew

    /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

  2. Add the Presidium Tap

    brew tap SPANDigital/homebrew-tap git@github.com:SPANDigital/homebrew-tap.git

  3. Install Presidium

    brew install presidium
